drug.name: Parnaparin
drug.description: Parnaparin is an heparin of low molecular weight with antithrombotic effects.

article.citation: Maugeri N, Di Fabio G, Barbanti M, de Gaetano G, Donati MB, Cerletti C: Parnaparin, a low-molecular-weight heparin, prevents P-selectin-dependent formation of platelet-leukocyte aggregates in human whole blood. Thromb Haemost. 2007 Jun;97(6):965-73.

drug.indication: Used in the prevention and treatment of venous thromboembolism (deep vein thrombosis and pulmonary embolism) and in the treatment of myocardial infarction.
